title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration
author: TonGerner
name: Exploration
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/"/> It is always good to have a look at the code/~WikiText TW uses in the core tiddlers and learn from it.
With this plugin you can explore code/~WikiText core tiddlers like the UI shadow tiddlers, code snippets, macros, themes and so on.
